title.rendered: Box Clever – Introduction by HK Tatler

content.rendered:
Don’t know what to do with your prized possessions? UltraVault’s high- security storage service offers convenience and peace of mind.

For most of us, the closest we get to a safe-deposit box is watching Matt Damon or Daniel Craig trying to crack one open in a movie. While Jason Bourne and James Bond aren’t after your valuables in real life, others could be—so it makes sense to consider storing your most precious possessions in a safe.

Of course, it’s more convenient to keep your valuables at home, so that you can wear your jewellery or admire your artwork whenever you like. But it is also a risk, plus you will pay more for insurance if you want to protect your assets.

One alternative is to store your valuables in a bricks-and-mortar bank, although this also has its drawbacks. Vaults are often located far from home and can only be accessed during strict opening hours—very frustrating if you decide at the last minute to wear your diamond necklace to a ball on a Saturday night but the bank is closed until Monday morning.

That’s where UltraVault comes in. No ordinary safe-deposit box, it’s a global security storage service without the limited opening hours and fixed locations of banks. Valuables are kept in ultra-secure private vaults operated by Malca- Amit, the world leader in secure logistics with over 50 years of experience in storing everything from paintings and sculptures to precious gems, coins and irreplaceable documents.

Better yet, your safe-deposit box is delivered to your door at a time and place of your choosing— your home, hotel or office, day or night. Only the verified owner can access the safe-deposit box using dual-key security and tamper-proof seals.

And with vaults in the heart of big cities such as Hong Kong, Singapore, Tokyo, Geneva, Zurich, London and New York, whether you’re in the same city as your safe-deposit box or a different country, you won’t be waiting long.

UltraVault can accommodate goods of various sizes and, of course, privacy and confidentiality are paramount—and its liability policy is world- class. Valuables can also be stored duty-free because the vaults are located in free-trade zones or bonded facilities.

Vaults this secure make for incredibly boring movie plots—007 would end up heading home to London empty-handed—but you will be able to sleep soundly knowing your most precious belongings are in safe hands.

Customised schedule

The UltraVault service offers vaults in various sizes and will deliver them at a time and place of your choosing.
